page.title: 15The Scout Barbeque
page.content: In our village, Grimsargh, we have a lot of annual events such as HalloweÂ£en parties,big bonfires,a school garden party and lots more.But this year the cubs and scouts had a barbeque.It was held at the beginning of June.There were posters up in the Post Office and garage. It started at 8.00p.m. and finished at 1.00a.m.There was a bar just for adults,and there was a sweet and drinks stall.There was a game for children,where you had to hook a skewer out of a bottle and then you won a lolly.For adults to eat there was chicken,a jacket potato and salad,and for children there was a beef burger,a sausage and salad.But best of all there was"Black Knights Disco"with lots of records and flashing lights.Everyone came and it was a great success.
